cause.description:
We forget, everyday we do, that we are so lucky. At a certain point in your life, you must have (I hope) thought to yourself as the tv flickers on pictures of starving and sick children around the world, "What if I was born there instead?"
We were all once children. We all know that it's what we go through as a child that makes us who we are today. Let's just give a little of what we have so that children around the world can have a decent life.
Give at http://www.worldvision.org/
1. Education for children is the start of a way out.
2. Shelter and food is crucial.
3. AIDS/ HIV orphans must be protected.
cause.mission: strive to give children love, food and a chance.
cause.name: Sponsor a child
